name: kaop
description: simple js OOP/AOP lib helper with classes, inheritance and method Advices (method interceptors)

scripts.dist: browserify ./index.js -o ./dist/kaop-lib.dev.js ; uglifyjs ./dist/kaop-lib.dev.js --compress --mangle --keep-fnames --output ./dist/kaop-lib.min.js ; git commit -am "prerelease - update dist"

author: ciroreed
